short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speeds up Jira ticket (issue) load time by using a cache.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are Jira ticket pages loading slowly and taking a long time for you to see the ticket (issue)?

 If this is the case, the extension will help you display a pop-up with a basic ticket info while the page is loading. It also includes comments, but not attachments, images, or custom fields.

You can modify the following settings:

âœ…  The popup can be hidden when the full page loads / when you mouse over it.
âœ…  You can choose whether to show the popup only if there's a faster cache available, or to show it anyway. 
âœ…  Choose whether you want to see the description or comments first.
âœ…  Also, you can choose whether to show older or newer comments first.
âœ…  Cache size can be set.
âœ…. Clear cache.
âœ….  Choose a color theme (including dark mode)

Disclaimer: this extension isn't related to Atlassian.

The ticket information is stored in your browser cache, and it doesn't get deleted automatically when you log out - you've got to delete it manually from the extension options/ browser history.
